remarks: Membership in a union of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Sep-2016.)
statement:
abfmpunirn.1 $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> { y | ph } ) $.
abfmpunirn.2 $e |- { y | ph } e. _V $.
abfmpunirn.3 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
abfmpunirn $p |- ( B e. U. ran F <-> ( B e. _V /\ E. x e. V ps ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d ps y $.
